description.french: Accomplir tous les succès.
description.spanish: Completa todos los logros.
description.japanese: 全ての実績を取得した
description.brazilian: Complete todas as conquistas.

displayName.japanese: はじまりの火を継ぐ者

description.english: Reach "To Link the First Flame" ending.
description.german: Erreiche das Ende "Bindet die Erste Flamme"
description.french: Atteindre la fin de "Entretenir la Première Flamme".
description.italian: Raggiungi il finale “Collegare la Prima Fiamma”.
description.spanish: Llega al final "Enlazar la Primera Llama".
description.schinese: 达成“初始之火的继承者”结局
description.tchinese: 達成「初始之火的繼承者」結局
description.japanese: 「はじまりの火を継ぐ者」のエンディングに到達した
description.brazilian: Alcance o final "Acender a Primeira Chama".

description.german: Erreiche das Ende "Das Ende des Feuers"
description.french: Terminer "La Fin du Feu".
description.italian: Raggiungi il finale “La fine del fuoco”.
description.spanish: Llega al final "El fin del fuego".
description.japanese: 「火継ぎの終わり」のエンディングに到達した
description.brazilian: Chegue ao final de "O Fim do Fogo".

description.german: Erreiche das Ende "Die Aneignung des Feuers"
description.french: Atteindre la fin de "L'Usurpation du Feu".
description.italian: Raggiungi il finale “La conquista del fuoco”.
description.spanish: Llega al final "La usurpación del fuego".
description.japanese: 「火の簒奪者」のエンディングに到達した
description.brazilian: Chegue ao final de "A Usurpação do Fogo".

displayName.french: Seign. des Cendres : Veilleurs des Abysses
displayName.spanish: Señores de la Ceniza: Vigilantes del Abismo
displayName.brazilian: Lordes das Cinzas: Vigilantes do Abismo

description.english: Defeat the Abyss Watchers, Lords of Cinder.
description.french: Vaincre les Veilleurs des Abysses, Seigneurs des Cendres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i Guardiani dell’Abisso, Signori dei Tizzoni.
description.spanish: Derrota a los Vigilantes del Abismo, Señores de la Ceniza.
description.schinese: 击败薪王“深渊的监视者”
description.tchinese: 擊敗薪王「深淵的監視者」
description.japanese: 薪の王「深淵の監視者」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote os Vigilantes do Abismo, Lordes das Cinzas.

displayName.english: Lord of Cinder: Yhorm the Giant
displayName.french: Seigneurs des Cendres : Yhorm le Géant
displayName.italian: Signore dei Tizzoni: Yhorm il Gigante
displayName.spanish: Señor de la Ceniza: Yhorm, el Gigante
displayName.brazilian: Lorde das Cinzas: Yhorm, o Gigante

description.english: Defeat Yhorm the Giant, Lord of Cinder.
description.french: Vaincre Yhorm le Géant, Seigneur des Cendres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Yhorm il Gigante, Signore dei Tizzoni.
description.spanish: Derrota a Yhorm, el Gigante y Señor de la Ceniza.
description.japanese: 薪の王「巨人ヨーム」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote Yhorm, o Gigante, Lorde das Cinzas.

displayName.english: Lord of Cinder: Aldrich, Devourer of Gods
displayName.french: Seign. Cendres : Aldrich, Dévoreur de dieux
displayName.koreana: 장작의 왕, 신을 먹는 자 엘드리치
displayName.spanish: Señor de la Ceniza: Aldrich, el Devoradioses
displayName.schinese: 薪王──吞噬神明的艾尔德利奇
displayName.tchinese: 薪王──吞噬神祇的艾爾德利奇
displayName.japanese: 薪の王、神喰らいのエルドリッチ
displayName.brazilian: Lorde das Cinzas: Aldrich, o Dev. de Deuses

description.english: Defeat Aldrich, Devourer of Gods, Lord of Cinder.
description.french: Vaincre Aldrich, le Dévoreur de dieux, Seigneur des Cendres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Aldrich, il Divoratore degli Dei, Signore dei Tizzoni.
description.koreana: 장작의 왕「신을 먹는 자 엘드리치」을 격파했다
description.spanish: Derrota a Aldrich, el Devoradioses y Señor de la Ceniza.
description.schinese: 击败薪王“吞噬神明的艾尔德利奇”
description.tchinese: 擊敗薪王「吞噬神祇的艾爾德利奇」
description.russian: Победите Олдрика, пожирателя богов, повелителя пепла.
description.japanese: 薪の王「神喰らいのエルドリッチ」を撃破した
description.polish: Pokonaj Aldricha, Pożeracza Bogów, Władcę Pogorzelisk.
description.brazilian: Derrote Aldrich, o Devorador de Deuses, Lorde das Cinzas.

displayName.english: Lord of Cinder: Lothric, Younger Prince
displayName.french: Seign. des Cendres : Lothric, Prince cadet
displayName.spanish: Señor de la Ceniza: Lothric, joven príncipe
displayName.japanese: 薪の王、王子ロスリック
displayName.brazilian: Lorde das Cinzas: Lothric, Prínc. Mais Jovem

description.english: Defeat Lothric, Younger Prince, Lord of Cinder.
description.french: Vaincre Lothric, Prince cadet, Seigneur des Cendres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Lothric, Principe secondogenito, Signore dei Tizzoni.
description.spanish: Derrota a Lothric, joven príncipe y Señor de la Ceniza.
description.schinese: 击败薪王“洛斯里克王子”
description.tchinese: 擊敗薪王「洛斯里克王子」
description.russian: Победите Лотрика, младшего принца, повелителя пепла.
description.japanese: 薪の王「王子ロスリック」を撃破した
description.polish: Pokonaj Lothrica, młodszego księcia, Władcę Pogorzelisk.
description.brazilian: Derrote Lothric, Príncipe Mais Jovem, Lorde das Cinzas.

description.english: Reinforce any weapon to the highest level.
description.german: Eine Waffe bis zur höchsten Stufe verstärken
description.french: Renforcer n'importe quelle arme au maximum.
description.koreana: 한 가지 무기를 최고 레벨까지 강화했다
description.spanish: Refuerza un arma al máximo nivel.
description.schinese: 将任一武器强化到极限
description.tchinese: 將任一武器強化到極限
description.russian: Укрепите любое оружие до максимального уровня.
description.japanese: 何れかの武器を限界まで強化した
description.polish: Wzmocnij jedną z broni do najwyższego poziomu.
description.brazilian: Reforce qualquer arma ao nível máximo.

displayName.spanish: Maestro en el dominio de imbuir

description.french: Accomplir toutes les formes d'imprégnation.
description.spanish: Imbuye de todas las formas posibles.
description.japanese: 全ての変質強化を行った
description.brazilian: Execute todas as formas de infusão.

description.french: Acquérir toutes les formes de sorcellerie.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los hechizos.
description.japanese: 全ての魔術を取得した
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os feitiços.

description.french: Acquérir toutes les formes de pyromancie.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las piromancias.
description.japanese: 全ての呪術を取得した
description.brazilian: Adquira todas as piromancias.

description.french: Acquérir toutes les formes de miracles.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los milagros.
description.japanese: 全ての奇跡を取得した
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os milagres.

description.french: Acquérir tous les anneaux.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los anillos.
description.japanese: 全ての指輪を取得した
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os anéis.

description.french: Apprendre toutes les émotes.
description.spanish: Aprende todos los gestos.
description.japanese: 全てのジェスチャーを取得した
description.brazilian: Aprenda todos os gestos.

description.english: Reinforce a bonfire to the highest level.
description.german: Ein Leuchtfeuer zur höchsten Stufe verstärken
description.french: Renforcer un Feu au maximum.
description.spanish: Refuerza una hoguera al máximo nivel.
description.russian: Укрепите любой костер до максимального уровня.
description.japanese: 篝火を限界まで強化した
description.brazilian: Reforce uma fogueira ao nível máximo.

description.english: Reinforce the Estus Flask to the highest level.
description.german: Einen Estus-Flakon zur höchsten Stufe verstärken
description.french: Renforcer la Fiole d'Estus au maximum.
description.italian: Rinforza al massimo la Fiaschetta Estus.
description.spanish: Refuerza el frasco de estus al máximo nivel.
description.russian: Укрепите флягу с эстусом до максимального уровня.
description.japanese: エスト瓶を限界まで強化した
description.polish: Wzmocnij butelkę estusa do najwyższego poziomu.
description.brazilian: Reforce o Frasco de Estus ao nível máximo.

displayName.spanish: Juramento: Guerrero de la Luz Solar

description.french: Découvrir le serment du Guerrier solaire.
description.italian: Scopri il patto dei Guerrieri del Sole.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento del Guerrero de la Luz Solar.
description.japanese: 誓約「太陽の戦士」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto do Guerreiro da Luz Solar.

description.french: Découvrir le serment de la Voie bleue.
description.italian: Scopri il patto della Via Blu.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de la Senda Azul.
description.japanese: 誓約「青教」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto do Caminho Azul.

description.french: Découvrir le serment des Sentinelles bleues.
description.italian: Scopri il patto delle Sentinelle Blu.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de los Centinelas Azules.
description.japanese: 誓約「青の守護者」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto dos Sentinelas Azuis.

displayName.french: Serment : Lame de la Lune noire
displayName.spanish: Juramento: Espada de la Luna Oscura

description.english: Discover Blade of the Darkmoon covenant.
description.french: Découvrir le serment de la Lame de la Lune noire.
description.italian: Scopri il patto della Lama della Luna Oscura.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de la Espada de la Luna Oscura.
description.japanese: 誓約「暗月の剣」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto da Lâmina da Lua Negra.

description.french: Découvrir le serment des Phalanges de Rosaria.
description.italian: Scopri il patto delle Dita di Rosaria.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de los Dedos de Rosaria.
description.schinese: 找出誓约“罗莎莉亚的指头”
description.tchinese: 找出誓約「羅莎莉亞的指頭」
description.japanese: 誓約「ロザリアの指」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto dos Dedos de Rosaria.

description.french: Découvrir le serment des Thanatophiles.
description.italian: Scopri il patto dei Creatori di tumuli.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de los Apiladores.
description.japanese: 誓約「積む者」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto dos Criadores de Montes.

description.french: Découvrir le serment des Guetteurs de Farron.
description.italian: Scopri il patto dei Guardiani di Farron.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento de los Sabuesos de Farron.
description.japanese: 誓約「ファランの番人」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto dos Vigilantes de Farron.

displayName.schinese: 誓约“吞噬神明的守护人”
displayName.tchinese: 誓約「吞噬神祇的守護人」
displayName.japanese: 誓約「神喰らいの守り手」

description.french: Découvrir le serment des Fidèles d'Aldrich.
description.italian: Scopri il patto dei Seguaci di Aldrich.
description.spanish: Descubre el juramento del Fiel Aldrich.
description.schinese: 找出誓约“吞噬神明的守护人”
description.tchinese: 找出誓約「吞噬神祇的守護人」
description.japanese: 誓約「神喰らいの守り手」を見出した
description.brazilian: Descubra o pacto do Devoto de Aldrich.

description.french: Atteindre les Sépultures oubliées.
description.spanish: Llega a las Tumbas Olvidadas.
description.japanese: 「無縁墓地」に到達した
description.brazilian: Chegue aos Túmulos Abandonados.

description.french: Atteindre le Pic du Dragon ancien.
description.spanish: Llega al Pico del Archidragón.
description.japanese: 「古竜の頂」に到達した
description.brazilian: Chegue ao Pico do Arquidragão.

description.french: Vaincre Iudex Gundyr.
description.spanish: Derrota a Iudex Gundyr.
description.schinese: 击败“‘ 灰烬审判者’古达”
description.japanese: 「灰の審判者、グンダ」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote Iudex Gundyr.

description.english: Defeat Vordt of the Boreal Valley.
description.french: Vaincre Vordt de la Vallée boréale.
description.spanish: Derrota a Vordt del Valle Boreal.
description.japanese: 「冷たい谷のボルド」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote Vordt do Vale Boreal.

description.french: Vaincre l'Arbre géant maudit.
description.spanish: Derrota al Gran Árbol corrompido.
description.japanese: 「呪腹の大樹」を撃破した
description.polish: Pokonaj toczonego przez klątwę wielkiego drzewca.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Grande Madeira Apodrecida.

description.french: Vaincre le Sage de cristal.
description.spanish: Derrota al Sabio de cristal.
description.japanese: 「結晶の古老」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Sábio de Cristal.

description.english: Defeat the Deacons of the Deep.
description.french: Vaincre les Diacres des Profondeurs.
description.spanish: Derrota a los Diáconos de la Oscuridad.
description.japanese: 「深みの主教たち」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote os Diáconos das Profundezas.

description.french: Vaincre Wolnir, le Chef suprême.
description.spanish: Derrota al Gran Señor Wolnir.
description.japanese: 「覇王ウォルニール」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Alto Lorde Wolnir.

description.french: Vaincre le Grand-maître Sulyvahn.
description.spanish: Derrota al Pontífice Sulyvahn.
description.japanese: 「法王サリヴァーン」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Pontífice Sulyvahn.

description.english: Defeat Dancer of the Boreal Valley.
description.french: Triompher de la Danseuse de la Vallée boréale.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Danzatrice della Valle Boreale.
description.spanish: Derrota a la Bailarina del Valle Boreal.
description.japanese: 「冷たい谷の踊り子」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Dançarino do Vale Boreal.

description.french: Vaincre l'Armure de Tueur de Dragons.
description.spanish: Derrota a la Armadura del Asesino de dragones.
description.japanese: 「竜狩りの鎧」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote a Armadura do Matador de Dragões.

description.french: Vaincre le Vieux Roi démoniaque.
description.spanish: Derrota al Viejo rey demonio.
description.japanese: 「デーモンの老王」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Antigo Rei Demônio.

description.french: Vaincre Oceiros, le Roi illuminé.
description.spanish: Derrota a Oceiros, el Rey Consumido.
description.japanese: 「妖王オスロエス」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote Oceiros, o Rei Decaído.

description.french: Vaincre Gundyr le Champion.
description.spanish: Derrota al Campeón Gundyr.
description.japanese: 「英雄グンダ」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Campeão Gundyr.

description.french: Vaincre la Vouivre ancienne.
description.spanish: Derrota al Wyvern antiguo.
description.japanese: 「古の飛竜」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Wyvern Ancião.

description.french: Vaincre le Roi sans nom.
description.spanish: Derrota al Rey Sin Nombre.
description.japanese: 「無名の王」を撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrote o Rei Sem Nome.

description.english: Light a bonfire flame for the first time.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal ein Leuchtfeuer entzünden
description.french: Allumer un Feu pour la première fois.
description.italian: Accendi un falò per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Enciende una hoguera por primera vez.
description.russian: Зажгите пламя костра в первый раз.
description.japanese: はじめて篝火を灯した
description.brazilian: Acenda uma fogueira pela primeira vez.

description.english: Become a Host of Embers for the first time.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal ein Träger der Glut werden
description.french: Devenir un Porte-Braises pour la première fois.
description.italian: Diventa portatore della brace per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Conviértete en Anfitrión de las Ascuas por primera vez.
description.russian: Станьте хозяином углей в первый раз.
description.japanese: はじめて火の力を得た
description.polish: Zostań po raz pierwszy Żagwią Żaru.
description.brazilian: Torne-se um Hospedeiro das Brasas pela primeira vez.
